# moviestats package vignette

```{r}
    
    ## Require
    require(magrittr)
    require(rvest)
    
    ## Workflow 
    
    # Get the 10.000 movies with the highest total gross
    ranked.titles <- getTitles(n.pages = 5)
    ranked.titles[duplicated(ranked.titles)]
    ranked.titles <- ranked.titles[!duplicated(ranked.titles)]
    length(ranked.titles)
    
    isTRUE('The Greatest Showman' %in% ranked.titles)
    which(ranked.titles == 'The Greatest Showman')
    
    searchTitles('greatest showman')
    
    greatestshowman <- fetchMovie('The Greatest Showman')
    names(greatestshowman)
    greatestshowman$actors <- actors(greatestshowman$id)
    
    thepost <- fetchMovie('The Post')
    thepost$actors <- getActors(thepost$id)
    
    starwars <- fetchMovie('Star Wars')
    starwars$actors <- getActors(starwars$id)
    
    
    
    list.movies <- head(searchTitles('star wars'))
    
    
    p1 <- plot.metric(metrics(greatestshowman), "total_gross", plotly = T)
    p2 <- plot.metric(metrics.thepost, "total_gross", plotly = T)




```
